content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Using the excerpt, answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly explain ONE cause of a historical development in the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE point of view of the excerpt. Briefly explain ONE way in which the situation in the excerpt is significant for a historical argument about immigration in the Gilded Age.
